backend/main.mo: Motoko actor fetching viral prompt JSON via http outcalls with Cloudflare/error fallback, storing last known good data, and exposing prompt retrieval helpers.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking feature IDs to affected frontend files, components, and test requirements.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend file’s purpose, focusing on prompt fetching, caching, UI components, hooks, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base/style configuration defining color tokens and light/dark theme variables using custom OKLCH palettes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/PLAY_STORE_RELEASE_NOTE.md: Release and compliance notes for Play Store submission covering policies, risks, testing requirements, privacy, and operational guidelines.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component wiring prompt fetching, settings, theming, navigation between list/detail, and global error boundary.
frontend/src/components/AboutDialog.tsx: Modal dialog describing the app, its data source, and usage disclaimers with links to viralprompts.in.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: A React error boundary that catches render errors and shows a recovery UI with retry and cache-clearing options. It resets when resetKey changes and logs errors to the console.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with attribution, a heart icon, a link to caffeine.ai, and a version label.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Displays the app header with branding and controls for theme, settings, and the about dialog.
frontend/src/components/PromptDetail.tsx: Shows a detailed view of a single prompt with image, metadata, categories, liking, copying, sharing, and back navigation. Includes clipboard and share handlers with feedback.
frontend/src/components/PromptList.tsx: Displays a searchable, sortable list of prompts with filtering, liking, sharing, loading states, and error handling. Supports cache clearing and selecting a prompt for detail view.
frontend/src/components/SettingsDialog.t: Provides a settings dialog allowing users to change theme, spacing, image visibility, and default sort order. Uses user settings and theme hooks to persist preferences.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: A button with tooltip that toggles between light and dark themes, respecting system mode when active.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor based on Internet Identity state. Automatically invalidates and refetches dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, state, and AuthClient initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useLikedPrompts.ts: Manages a Set of liked prompt IDs with localStorage persistence and helpers to toggle or query liked status.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Tracks and stores theme preference (light, dark, system) and applies it to the document with system‑theme sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserSettings.ts: Stores and updates user settings such as theme, spacing, image visibility, and default sorting with localStorage sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useViralPrompts.ts: Fetches viral prompts via backend using React Query with caching, refresh helpers, and cache fallback behavior.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes, applied via root and .dark classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
Implements localStorage caching for viral prompts with validation, timestamps, and cache‑clearing utilities.
frontend/src/services/viralPromptsClient: Fetches and validates viral prompts data with extensive error detection for HTML, Cloudflare blocks, and malformed JSON.
frontend/src/services/viralPromptsParsin: Preprocesses, sanitizes, and normalizes raw prompt JSON into validated ViralPromptsResponse objects.
frontend/src/types/viralPrompts.ts: Defines TypeScript types for viral prompts and the API response structure.
frontend/src/utils/clipboard.ts: Provides a clipboard copy helper using the Clipboard API with a textarea-based fallback.
frontend/src/utils/sharePrompt.ts: Attempts to share a URL via the Web Share API and falls back to copying the URL to the clipboard.
frontend/src/utils/viralPrompts.ts: Builds canonical and image URLs and parses multi-line how-to-use text into steps.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes project state, including prompt-loading issues and the need to show the app version in the footer.
